import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import dayjs from "dayjs"; import {nanoid } from 'nanoid' const tableRefund = []; export default function Form() { const { register, handleSubmit} = useForm(tableRefund); function handleAddFormSubmit(data){ data['id'] = nanoid(); data.ticket == true ? data.ticket = 'Sì' : data.ticket = 'No'; tableRefund.push(data) console.log(tableRefund) } return (
handleAddFormSubmit(data))}>

); } export {tableRefund}
